title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 22.21 - Producer payroll report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 22.21 - Producer payroll report

State Regulations

Each dealer shall report with respect to producers on or
before the 25th day of the month, such dealers producer payroll for the second
preceding month which shall show for each producer in addition to the
information required by State and/or Federal milk marketing orders the amount
of the over-order rate paid to each producer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
22.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
